sentence: "It is time for Herschel Walker to enter through the front door, make himself available to the public and have the press do interviews that test your knowledge and skills and answer the many questions that everyone has," Black said Friday, saying Walker needs to talk about his policy positions as well as his past.
author: JEFF AMY Associated Press
title: Walker's past could let Warnock keep Senate seat, rivals say

sentence: ATLANTA (AP) Republicans risk losing the U.S. Senate race if they nominate Herschel Walker, two of Walker's rivals said, citing a report by The Associated Press about how police confiscated a gun from the former football great following a domestic dispute 20 years ago.
title: Walker's past could let Warnock keep Senate seat, rivals say

sentence: Associated Press Heavily redacted records from 2001 incident at Walkers former home in a gated suburban Dallas subdivision adds another layer to an already turbulent personal history, which includes the former football stars acknowledged struggles with mental health, violent outbursts and accusations that he repeatedly threatened his ex-wife WASHINGTON (AP) One warm fall evening in 2001, police in Irving, Texas, received an alarming call from Herschel Walkers therapist.
author: Associated Press
title: Texas police report provided to the AP under legal compulsion complicates the Herschel Walker redemption tale
